game_meta.title: Tulane Green Wave at Ole Miss Rebels
game_meta.venue: Vaught–Hemingway Stadium at Hollingsworth Field, Oxford, MS

weather.notes: Heat near 90°F at kickoff, light wind; conditioning/tempo could slow late.

hype_factors: Historic rivalry matchup (Ole Miss 13-game series streak)
G5 upset buzz with Tulane receiving votes
Lookahead spot for Ole Miss next week

home.name: Ole Miss Rebels
home.recent_form: 3-0 start; explosive offense ~542 YPG, failed to cover last 2
motivation_factors: Protect Top-15 ranking and playoff path
Backup QB audition while starter recovers

away.name: Tulane Green Wave
away.recent_form: 3-game win streak; +6 turnover margin; upset Duke last week
motivation_factors: National TV upset shot vs Top-15

last_meeting.note: Ole Miss pulled away late in New Orleans

matchup_history.recent_trend: MISS has won 13 straight in series

odds.consensus_note: Spread stable across major books; total steamed higher into low 60s.

key_trends: Tulane +6 turnover margin vs Ole Miss −2 this season
Ole Miss failed to cover last two games
VSiN model flags value to the UNDER around 61.5
situational_spots: Potential lookahead for Ole Miss with LSU on deck
Hot afternoon kickoff may slow tempo and drive rate

moneyline.rationale: QB uncertainty for MISS plus Tulane’s elite TO margin creates live dog profile

spread.rationale: Market steady near −12.5 with public on favorite; defensive/TO edges for dog

total.rationale: Heat + QB injury + model lean to Under after 4-point steam up

best_bet.rationale: Multiple factors (weather, QB status, model lean) align; market moved into value

injuries_news: MISS starting QB Austin Simmons doubtful (ankle)
Tulane no major new injuries reported
matchup_notes: MISS offense rank ~11 by total offense; Tulane top-tier TO margin
Series: MISS leads 45-28; last win for TULN in 1988
coaching_notes: Lane Kiffin offense vs Jon Sumrall’s balanced, turnover-hunting defense
MISS defense vulnerable vs QB runs; TULN QB Retzlaff dual-threat

excitement_factors.playoff_implications: MISS needs convincing win to stay in Top-10 hunt
excitement_factors.conference_impact: Non-conf but resume-shaping for both (NY6 path for TULN)
excitement_factors.narrative: Upset-minded AAC power vs banged-up Top-15 SEC host
tv_storylines: QB watch: Will Simmons play or is it Chambliss again?
13-game Ole Miss streak vs Tulane — can the Wave snap it?
